title: Health & Safety
description: This is a quiz on Health & Safety

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a recommended ergonomic practice for computer workplace station?

options.answer: Adjust your chair height so your feet are flat on the ground.
Maintain a 90-degree angle between your wrists and your keyboard
Use the computer mouse with your arm fuly extended.

questions.question: TRUE or FALSE: It is only the resoponsiblity of management to assess and identify risks.
In a case of a fire emergency, what should you do first?

options.answer: Call a colleague to inform them about the fire
Evacuate the building immediately via the elevator.
Evacuate the builing immediately via the nearest exit.
Try to extinguish the fire with an office fire extinguisher.

questions.question: When lifting heavy objects in the office, what is the correct technique to prevent back injuries?

options.answer: Bend your back forward whilst keeping your legs straight.
Keep the object close to your body and bend your knees to lift.
Twist your torso while lifting to get a better grip.

questions.question: Why is it important to have regular breaks during the workday?

options.answer: They are not important. Breaks are unecessary and reduce productivity.
To give your eyes a rest from the computer screen and reduce strain.
To catch up on personal calls and social media.
